attributes.action: Reveal the total weekly cost of of the Bibby Stockholm barge
attributes.additional_details: As the barge has had minimal occupation since it first docked and has generated a lot of negative publicity regarding its unsuitability, British taxpayers are entitled to know how much of their money is being spent on this potential white elephant.
attributes.background: The government is refusing to reveal how much the Bibby Stockholm barge is costing the British taxpayer each week because they say it's "not in the public interest."

rejection.details: You can find out how to make a freedom of information (FOI) request, and what you can do if you're not happy with an organisation's response to an FOI request, here: https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
